casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Raheem WILLIAMS, Petitioner No. 26 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 25, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 25 th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:

(1) Did the trial court abuse its discretion in precluding the questioning of jurors about their views on guns and gun violence during voir dire ?
